page.title: 15A day in my life
page.content: A typical Sunday for me would start at 8 a.m. I go and feed my ponies and water them.I return home and have my breakfast.I have my food and then wash.Then an hour later I fetch my tack and take it down to the stables. I brush the pony and put on its saddle and bridle.I take him out of the stable and then I mount him.I take him up to the school area and to dressage, sometimes I jump the fences. On my frisky pony I brush her and tack her up.I take her out of the stable,mount her and go for a gallop, then jump her.I put her in the stable. I untack her. I end by riding my young pony.As he is very young I only do dressage. Some Sundays I compete in competitions, I have won a lot of cups. For the rest of the day I drink tea and watch television.
